comments:
Build ID: M20070212-1330

Steps To Reproduce:
Just upgraded Mylar and installed some Eclipse patches and this started happening. It happens whenever I start Eclipse or Flex Builder 2 (Mac OS X Intel).

I am additionally getting an internal error while trying to submit this bug within Eclipse/Flex Builder.

More information:
Just upgraded Mylar Task extension. I am getting this error in FlexBuilder 2 and Eclipse.

-- Error Log --

*** Bug 187928 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 187927 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 187926 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Hmmm, sorry about the duplicates, I guess the mylar integration did create the tasks.

After more testing I've found that the initial version that I had installed is the ones that ends in -1300. If I remove all of my mylar plugins/features and reinstall the versions I find are the -1300 ones. They work fine.

If I then try to upgrade my extensions I get a -1800 version of Mylar Task List. Once this is installed I get the above error.

I just tested with Eclipse 3.3 RC1 and this problem does not happen. Looks like the -1800 Mylar Task List only works with Eclipse 3.3+, not with 3.2. (Hence it will also not work with Flex Builder 2 for Mac OS X as that is based on Eclipse 3.2).

For Eclipse versions < 3.3 RC1 and Mylar versions < 2.0M3 you always need to run "Search for new features to install" as discussed on the download page.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 132450 ***
Changing OS from Mac OS to Mac OS X as per bug 185991
